# [Resources](/docs/resources) / Textures

Every model looks much better with textures, so here are plenty of websites to choose them from:

## 3D textures

-   [https://3dtextures.me](https://3dtextures.me)
-   [https://www.3dxo.com](https://www.3dxo.com)
-   [https://ambientcg.com/](https://ambientcg.com/)
-   [https://www.arroway-textures.ch/](https://www.arroway-textures.ch/)
-   [https://www.artstation.com/marketplace/](https://www.artstation.com/marketplace/)
-   [https://artvee.com](https://artvee.com)
-   [https://cc0textures.com](https://cc0textures.com)
-   [https://freepbr.com](https://freepbr.com)
-   [https://greyscalegorilla.com/](https://greyscalegorilla.com/)
-   [https://hdrihaven.com](https://hdrihaven.com)
-   [https://www.poliigon.com](https://www.poliigon.com)
-   [https://publicdomainreview.org](https://publicdomainreview.org)
-   [https://quixel.com/megascans](https://quixel.com/megascans)
-   [https://substance3d.adobe.com/assets/](https://substance3d.adobe.com/assets/)
-   [https://texturehaven.com](https://texturehaven.com)
-   [https://www.textures.com](https://www.textures.com)
-   [http://texturelib.com](http://texturelib.com)
-   [https://www.cgbookcase.com](https://www.cgbookcase.com)
-   [http://uvchecker.byvalle.com/](http://uvchecker.byvalle.com/)

## Illustrations

-   [https://blush.design/collections](https://blush.design/collections)
-   [https://github.com/sw-yx/spark-joy#illustrations](https://github.com/sw-yx/spark-joy#illustrations)
-   [https://gumroad.com/pablostanley](https://gumroad.com/pablostanley)
-   [https://www.manypixels.co/gallery](https://www.manypixels.co/gallery)
-   [https://www.openpeeps.com](https://www.openpeeps.com)

## Paintings

Some 3D experiences definitely benefit from high quality paintings from large art collections:

-   [https://www.rijksmuseum.nl/en/rijksstudio](https://www.rijksmuseum.nl/en/rijksstudio)
-   [https://www.britishmuseum.org/collection](https://www.britishmuseum.org/collection)
